body:
Welp, I guess this is it. I had a fun ride while it lasted, and I will not forget about the amazing server. Thank you to all my friends!1 (You know who you are)

That's it, BYE GUYS!

replies.body:
Well,never saw this coming...

Ill never forget the days I killed you (not very much) and when you killed me (VERY much).

But can you just appeal,it would shatter my soul if you just left...


But if these are my last words to you,gl irl my friend,have fun in other communitys and I hope you find one as heart warming as Avicus!

-Sevo

PS:Don't forget,we will always remember you :)

replies.body:
@AtditC So lemme get this straight, you're being a dick to the guy who ATTEMPTED to become friends with you. I've done nothing mean to you, sure, I've said a few rude things to  OTHER PEOPLE, but I learned from those mistakes. My most recent infractions were just mistakes that I take the blame for. Also, you say that I SPAM characters in chat constantly? Nope, that is something I haven't done.

@jive0205 Have I done anything to you? I don't recall.


@lance_2000 Wanna tell me why you nee to make that negative comment?

To you 3, it's been a shame playing on same server as you. Why post if you have nothing positive to say?

replies.body:
Guys.

I realize that some of you haven't had the best experiences with Yoshi, but he's been around for a while and he at least deserves a proper good-bye. He has made friends with many people on the server, and I am one of them. There is no reason for you to bother him and others about his mistakes. If you have anything bad to say about him, simply don't say it.
(I'm not trying to be biased or anything, but Yoshi doesn't deserve the hate he's getting.)

Anyways, it's sad to see you go, Yoshi. I wish you the best in your future <3
replies.body_tagged:
Guys.

I realize that some of you haven't had the best experiences with Yoshi, but he's been around for a while and he at least deserves a proper good-bye. He has made friends with many people on the server, and I am one of them. There is no reason for you to bother him and others about his mistakes. If you have anything bad to say about him, simply don't say it.
(I'm not trying to be biased or anything, but Yoshi doesn't deserve the hate he's getting.)

Anyways, it's sad to see you go, Yoshi. I wish you the best in your future <3

replies.body:
+1 

At least have the balls to not be salty and give him a proper goodbye as a long-time community member. He doesn't deserve this sort of hate on his leaving post. It straight out disgusts me that anyone has the nerve to be so impolite to someone who was such a big part of the community on their final post, final hour. 

Anyways, GL man and when I go on OCN sometimes I hope to see you. Even though I don't go on OCN that much. Thanks for the great times. got that Scorpio sweg doe (such pwnage that game). Best of luck with your future! Farewell my friend!

+1

Anyways, GL man and when I go on OCN sometimes I hope to see you. Even though I don't go on OCN that much. Thanks for the great times. got that Scorpio sweg doe (such pwnage that game). Best of luck with your future! Farewell my friend!

replies.body:
Bai. 

While he has contributed to a large part of the community in some way, if he truly learned from his mistakes then he wouldn't have 4 pages worth of infractions. Overlooking this is biased. 

If you're his friend then tell him facts in a respectful way. Perhaps all this attention has fueled his behavioral patterns.

IMO, to others attacking Atdit, he has a point as i stated above. He is just telling him that he deserves it for his arrogant behavior in chat. He isn't hating or attacking him in any way. Please don't be bias.

Though cold, he is simply stating facts.

To Atdit, you have a point. But stating facts on a topic like this was a bit random and the way you talked about it wasnt very smooth. It was quite blunt.

To yoshi, i may not know you much but i know of you as a good pvper who is quite arrogant to other players, but is deep down an easy-going person. I believe.

But Atdit has a point; if i was to be banned and got appealed I'd act like a goodsport.

Look at my infractions. They are spaced out in their dates because i generally try to be cordial and respectful with people. 

Now, im not sure that you'll be unbanned due to multiple bans and 4 pages of infractions *cringes*... but hopefully IF you get unbanned then next time, keep a level head and try to not be arrogant  ingame.

Alright?

reply_to.body:
Bai. 

While he has contributed to a large part of the community in some way, if he truly learned from his mistakes then he wouldn't have 4 pages worth of infractions. Overlooking this is biased. 

If you're his friend then tell him facts in a respectful way. Perhaps all this attention has fueled his behavioral patterns.

IMO, to others attacking Atdit, he has a point as i stated above. He is just telling him that he deserves it for his arrogant behavior in chat. He isn't hating or attacking him in any way. Please don't be bias.

Though cold, he is simply stating facts.

To Atdit, you have a point. But stating facts on a topic like this was a bit random and the way you talked about it wasnt very smooth. It was quite blunt.

To yoshi, i may not know you much but i know of you as a good pvper who is quite arrogant to other players, but is deep down an easy-going person. I believe.

But Atdit has a point; if i was to be banned and got appealed I'd act like a goodsport.

Look at my infractions. They are spaced out in their dates because i generally try to be cordial and respectful with people. 

Now, im not sure that you'll be unbanned due to multiple bans and 4 pages of infractions *cringes*... but hopefully IF you get unbanned then next time, keep a level head and try to not be arrogant  ingame.

Alright?
reply_to.body_tagged:
Bai. 

While he has contributed to a large part of the community in some way, if he truly learned from his mistakes then he wouldn't have 4 pages worth of infractions. Overlooking this is biased. 

If you're his friend then tell him facts in a respectful way. Perhaps all this attention has fueled his behavioral patterns.

IMO, to others attacking Atdit, he has a point as i stated above. He is just telling him that he deserves it for his arrogant behavior in chat. He isn't hating or attacking him in any way. Please don't be bias.

Though cold, he is simply stating facts.

To Atdit, you have a point. But stating facts on a topic like this was a bit random and the way you talked about it wasnt very smooth. It was quite blunt.

To yoshi, i may not know you much but i know of you as a good pvper who is quite arrogant to other players, but is deep down an easy-going person. I believe.

But Atdit has a point; if i was to be banned and got appealed I'd act like a goodsport.

Look at my infractions. They are spaced out in their dates because i generally try to be cordial and respectful with people. 

Now, im not sure that you'll be unbanned due to multiple bans and 4 pages of infractions *cringes*... but hopefully IF you get unbanned then next time, keep a level head and try to not be arrogant  ingame.

Alright?
